subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor
description_text:
Hello,

is the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor compatible with FANATEC and PS5?
Is everything included to connect to the FANATEC wheelbase?

Regards,
Jasper

conversations.body_text: Hi jasper doves, Our product currently does not support Fanatec connections, but it can be used by plugging directly into a computer via USB.Â
